testsuite.name: com.company.promotions.search.api.promotions.infrastructure.persistence.PriceRepositoryImplIT

testcase.name: Should return multiple applicable prices ordered by priority descending
Test 3: Request at 21:00 on day 14 for product 35455, brand 1 (ZARA)
Test 1: Request at 10:00 on day 14 for product 35455, brand 1 (ZARA)
Test 2: Request at 16:00 on day 14 for product 35455, brand 1 (ZARA)
Should return empty for non-existent product
Should return all prices for a product and brand
Should return empty when no price applies
Test 4: Request at 10:00 on day 15 for product 35455, brand 1 (ZARA)
Test 5: Request at 21:00 on day 16 for product 35455, brand 1 (ZARA)
